36.347. 前 K 个高频元素
#

使用一个小顶堆来保存按出现次数排列的数据。当总数大于 k 时，将堆顶出堆

public int[] topKFrequent(int[] nums, int k) {
    Queue<int[]> heap = new PriorityQueue<>((int[] a, int[] b) -> a[1] - b[1]);
    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
    for (int num : nums) {
        map.put(num, map.getOrDefault(num, 0) + 1);
    }
    for (int key : map.keySet()) {
        heap.offer(new int[]{key, map.get(key)});
        if (heap.size() > k) {
            heap.poll();
        }
    }
    
    int[] res = new int[k];
    int i = 0;
    while (!heap.isEmpty()) {
        res[i++] = heap.poll()[0];
    }

    return res;
}

// 或
public int[] topKFrequent(int[] nums, int k) {
    Queue<Map.Entry<Integer, Integer>> heap = new PriorityQueue<>((a, b) -> a.getValue() - b.getValue());
    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();

    for (int num : nums) {
        map.put(num, map.getOrDefault(num, 0) + 1);
    }

    for (Map.Entry<Integer, Integer> entry : map.entrySet()) {
        heap.offer(entry);
        if (heap.size() > k) {
            heap.poll();
        }
    }

    int[] res = new int[k];
    int i = 0;
    while (!heap.isEmpty()) {
        res[i++] = heap.poll().getKey();
    }
    return res;
}

37.338. 比特位计数
#

  • 奇数比偶数多一个 1
  • 偶数 1 的个数和除 2 后的个数一致
public int[] countBits(int n) {
    int[] res = new int[n + 1];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (i % 2 == 1) {
            res[i] = res[i - 1] + 1;
        } else {
            res[i] = res[i / 2];
        }
    }

    return res;
}

38.121. 买卖股票的最佳时机
# 

public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
    int min = 10009; // 最低点
    int max = 0;     // 可获得的最大收益
    for(int p : prices){
        if(p - min > max){  // 收益最大化
            max = p - min;  
        }
        if(p < min){        // 寻找最低点
            min = p;
        }
    }
    return max;
}

39.337. 打家劫舍 III
#

树形DP，选或不选

public int rob(TreeNode root) {
    int[] res = dfs(root);
    return Math.max(res[0], res[1]); // 跟节点选或不选的最大值
}

// 返回值 0 位置表示不选， 1 位置表示选
private int[] dfs(TreeNode root) {
    if (root == null) { // 边界条件
        return new int[2];
    }
    int[] res = new int[2];
    int[] left = dfs(root.left);    // 递归左子树
    int[] right = dfs(root.right);  // 递归右子树

    res[0] = Math.max(left[0], left[1]) + Math.max(right[0], right[1]); // 不选根
    res[1] = left[0] + right[0] + root.val; // 选根节点，就不选子节点

    return res;
}

40.122. 买卖股票的最佳时机 II
#

方法一、贪心算法

public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
    int res = 0;
    int min = prices[0];
    for (int i = 0; i < prices.length; i++) {
        if (min < prices[i]) {
            res += prices[i] - min;
        }
        min = prices[i];
    }
    return res;
}

方法二、动态规划

public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
    int n = prices.length;
    // dp[i][0] 表示第i天结束未持股时的最大收益
    // dp[i][1] 表示第i天结束持股时的最大收益
    int[][] dp = new int[n + 1][2];
    // dp[0][0] = 0;    // 不持股时收益为 0 
    dp[0][1] = Integer.MIN_VALUE;     // 不可能持股，收益为 -inf
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        // 未持股 或 卖出股票
        dp[i + 1][0] = Math.max(dp[i][0], dp[i][1] + prices[i]);
        dp[i + 1][1] = Math.max(dp[i][1], dp[i][0] - prices[i]);
    }
    return dp[n][0];
}

41. 309. 买卖股票的最佳时机含冷冻期
# 

public int maxProfit(int[] prices) {
    // dp[i] 表示第 i - 1 天结束时的收益
    // dp[0]:不持股  dp[i + 2][0] = Math.max(dp[i + 1][0], dp[i + 1][1] + prices[i])
    // dp[1]:持股    dp[i + 2][1] = Math.max(dp[i + 1][1], dp[i][0] - prices[i])
    int n = prices.length;
    int[][] dp = new int[n + 2][2];
    dp[1][1] = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        dp[i + 2][0] = Math.max(dp[i + 1][0], dp[i + 1][1] + prices[i]);
        dp[i + 2][1] = Math.max(dp[i + 1][1], dp[i][0] - prices[i]);
    }
    return dp[n + 1][0];
}

42. 「Hard」312. 戳气球
#

  • 添加虚拟的气球
  • 极其巧妙的DP：dp[i][j] 表示戳破 i～j 之间气球后得到的最多数量🪙，以最后戳破来得到子问题
  • dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j], dp[i][k] + dp[k][j] + balloons[i] * balloons[k] * balloons[j]);
  • 为了求 dp[i][j] 之前，希望左侧的和下面的已经求得，使用从下往上，从左至右遍历
public int maxCoins(int[] nums) {
    // 加上虚拟气球
    int n = nums.length + 2;
    int[] balloons = new int[n];
    balloons[0] = 1;
    balloons[n - 1] = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 2; i++) {
        balloons[i + 1] = nums[i];
    }

    // dp[i][j] 表示戳破 i～j 之间气球后得到的最多数量🪙
    int[][] dp = new int[n][n];
    // 求 dp[i][j] 之前，希望左侧的和下面的已经求得，使用从下往上，从左至右遍历
    for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
        for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
            // 以 k 为最后一个气球戳破
            for (int k = i + 1; k < j; k++) {
                dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j], 
                        dp[i][k] + dp[k][j] + balloons[i] * balloons[k] * balloons[j]);
            }
        }
    }

    return dp[0][n - 1];
}

43.300. 最长递增子序列
# 

public int lengthOfLIS(int[] nums) {
    // dp[i] 表示以nums[i] 结尾的最长连续子序列长度
    int n = nums.length;
    int[] dp = new int[n];

    int max = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0 ; j < i; j++) {
            if (nums[i] > nums[j]) {
                dp[i] = Math.max(dp[i], dp[j]);
            }
        }
        dp[i]++;    
        max = Math.max(max, dp[i]);
    }

    return max;
}

44.「Hard」297. 二叉树的序列化与反序列化
# 

public class Codec {

    // Encodes a tree to a single string.
    public String serialize(TreeNode root) {
        if (root == null) {
            return "X,";
        }
        String left = serialize(root.left);
        String right = serialize(root.right);
        return root.val + "," + left + right;
    }

    // Decodes your encoded data to tree.
    public TreeNode deserialize(String data) {
        String[] list = data.split(",");
        LinkedList<String> queue = new LinkedList<>();
        Arrays.stream(list).forEach(s -> queue.addLast(s));
        return buildTree(queue);
    }

    // 基于list构建当前子树
    private TreeNode buildTree(LinkedList<String> queue) {
        String val = queue.pollFirst();
        if ("X".equals(val)) {
            return null;
        }

        TreeNode root = new TreeNode(Integer.valueOf(val));
        root.left = buildTree(queue);
        root.right = buildTree(queue);
        return root;
    }
}

45.283. 移动零
# 

public void moveZeroes(int[] nums) {
    int cur = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
        if (nums[i] != 0) {
            nums[cur++] = nums[i];
        }
    }
    while (cur < nums.length) {
        nums[cur++] = 0;
    }
}

46.279. 完全平方数
#

完全背包

public int numSquares(int n) {
    // dp[i] 表示和为i的完全平方数的最少数量
    int[] dp = new int[n + 1];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        dp[i] = i;  // 最坏情况，都使用 1
        for (int j = 1; i - j * j >= 0; j++) {
            // 选dp[i - j * j] + 1 不选dp[i]  
            dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i - j * j] + 1);
        }
    }

    return dp[n];
}

47. 239. 滑动窗口最大值
#

维护单调递减的队列「下标」

public int[] maxSlidingWindow(int[] nums, int k) {
    if (k == 1) return nums;
    // 维护单调递减的队列「下标」
    int n = nums.length;
    int[] res = new int[n - k + 1];
    LinkedList<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        // 入队列
        while (!queue.isEmpty() && nums[queue.peekLast()] <= nums[i]) {
            queue.pollLast();  // 维护单调递减的队列
        }
        queue.addLast(i);
        // 出队列
        if (i - queue.peekFirst() >= k) {
            queue.pollFirst();
        }
        // 记录答案
        if (i >= k - 1) {
            // 队列单调递减，所以窗口最大值就是队首
            res[i - k + 1] = nums[queue.peekFirst()];
        }
    }
    return res;
}

48.240. 搜索二维矩阵 II
#

每次以剩余矩阵的右上角作为判断依据

  • 若 < t，则当前行都不满足，排除本行
  • 若 > t，则当前列都不满足，排除本列
public boolean searchMatrix(int[][] matrix, int target) {
    int m = matrix.length, n = matrix[0].length;

    int i = 0, j = n - 1;
    while (i < m && j >= 0) {
        if (matrix[i][j] < target) i++; // 排除第 i 行
        else if (matrix[i][j] > target) j--; // 排除第 j 列
        else return true;
    }

    return false;
}

49.22.括号生成
#

回溯，对每一个选择进行回溯，满足条件的加入答案

class Solution {
    public List<String> generateParenthesis(int n) {
        char[] choice = {'(', ')'};
        List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();
        dfs(res, new StringBuilder(), n, choice);
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(List<String> res, StringBuilder path, int n, char[] choice) {
        if (isTrue(path, n)) {
            res.add(path.toString());
            return;
        }

        if (path.length() > 2 * n) {
            return;
        }

        for (char c : choice) {
            path.append(c);
            dfs(res, path, n, choice);
            path.deleteCharAt(path.length() - 1);
        }
    }

    private boolean isTrue(StringBuilder path, int n) {
        if (path.length() != 2 * n) return false;
        String s = path.toString();
        char[] stack = new char[2 * n];
        int top = -1;

        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
            char c = s.charAt(i);
            if (c == '(') {
                stack[++top] = '(';
            } else if (top != -1) {
                top--;
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        }

        return top == -1;
    }
}

50.49. 字母异位词分组
# 

public List<List<String>> groupAnagrams(String[] strs) {
    Map<String,  List<String>> map = new HashMap<>();
    for (String s : strs) {
        char[] chs = s.toCharArray();
        Arrays.sort(chs);
        String key = new String(chs);
        if (!map.containsKey(key)) {
            map.put(key, new ArrayList<String>());
        } 
        map.get(key).add(s);
    }

    return new ArrayList<>(map.values());
}

51.48. 旋转图像
# 

public void rotate(int[][] matrix) {
    int n = matrix.length;
    int iMax = (n - 1) / 2;
    for (int i = 0; i <= iMax; i++) {
        int jMax = n - i - 1;
        for (int j = i; j < jMax; j++) {
            int temp = matrix[i][j];

            matrix[i][j] = matrix[n - j - 1][i];
            matrix[n - j - 1][i] = matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1];
            matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1] = matrix[j][n - i - 1];
            matrix[j][n - i - 1] = temp;
        }
    }
}

52.46. 全排列
# 

class Solution {
    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();
    List<Integer> list;

    public List<List<Integer>> permute(int[] nums) {
        list = Arrays.stream(nums).boxed().collect(Collectors.toList());
        dfs(0);
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(int x) {
        if (x == list.size() - 1) {
            res.add(new ArrayList(list));
            return;
        }
        // 从 x 开始，遍历之后的位置
        for (int i = x; i < list.size(); i++) {
            swap(x, i); // 交换 x 和 i
            dfs(x + 1); // 固定位置 x 后，寻找 x + 1
            swap(x, i); // 恢复现场
        }
    }

    private void swap(int i, int j) {
        int t = list.get(i);
        list.set(i, list.get(j));
        list.set(j, t);
    }
}

53.「Hard」42.接雨水
#

使用两个单调栈，分别保存从左到右的最大值、从右到左的最大值。则最小的最大值减去当前的值为可以接的雨水量

public int trap(int[] height) {
    int n = height.length;
    int[] maxLeft = new int[n];
    int[] maxRight = new int[n];

    maxLeft[0] = height[0];
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        maxLeft[i] = Math.max(maxLeft[i - 1], height[i]);
    }

    maxRight[n - 1] = height[n - 1];
    for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
        maxRight[i] = Math.max(maxRight[i + 1], height[i]);
    }

    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        res += Math.min(maxLeft[i], maxRight[i]) - height[i];
    }

    return res;
}

54.39. 组合总和
# 

class Solution {
    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();
    
    public List<List<Integer>> combinationSum(int[] candidates, int target) {
        dfs(candidates, target, new ArrayList<>(), 0, 0);
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(int[] candidates, int target, List<Integer> path, int curSum, int index) {
        if (curSum == target) {
            res.add(new ArrayList<>(path));
            return;
        } else if (curSum > target) {
            return;
        }
        // 注意每次回溯都从当前开始「意思是只能选择当前及之后的数字为候选」
        for (int i = index; i < candidates.length; i++) {
            path.add(candidates[i]);
            dfs(candidates, target, path, curSum + candidates[i], i);
            path.remove(path.size() - 1);
        }
    }
}

55.543. 二叉树的直径
# 

class Solution {
    int res = 0;
    public int diameterOfBinaryTree(TreeNode root) {
        dfs(root);
        return res - 1;
    }

    private int dfs(TreeNode node) {
        if (node == null) {
            return 0;
        }
        int left = dfs(node.left);
        int right = dfs(node.right);
        res = Math.max(res, left + right + 1);
        return Math.max(left, right) + 1;
    }
}

56.34. 在排序数组中查找元素的第一个和最后一个位置
#

使用中间点来快速缩小范围，一侧相等则缩小另一侧，直到两侧都找到最终位置

public int[] searchRange(int[] nums, int target) {
    int l = 0, r = nums.length - 1;
    while (l <= r && (nums[l] != target || nums[r] != target)) {
        int t = (r - l) / 2 + l;
        if (nums[t] < target) {
            l = t + 1;
        } else if (nums[t] > target) {
            r = t - 1;
        } else if (nums[l] == target){
            r--;
        } else {
            l++;
        }
    }
    return l <= r ? new int[]{l, r} : new int[]{-1, -1};
}

57.33. 搜索旋转排序数组
# 

public int search(int[] nums, int target) {
    int l = 0, r = nums.length - 1;
    while (l <= r) {
        int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            return mid;
        }
        if (nums[mid] < nums[l]) {
            // mid 在右侧
            if (nums[mid] < target && nums[r] >= target) {
                l = mid + 1;
            } else {
                r = mid - 1;
            }
        } else {
            // mid 在左侧
            if (nums[mid] > target && nums[l] <= target) {
                r = mid - 1;
            } else {
                l = mid + 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

58.「Hard」32. 最长有效括号
#

dp[i] 表示以i下标结尾的最长有效字符串的长度

  • i 位置为 ( ———— dp[i] = 0
  • i 位置为 )
    • i - 1 位置为 ( ———— dp[i] = dp[i - 2]「若存在」 + 2
    • i - 1 位置为 ) i - 1 位置是有效的括号对、与 i 配对的位置为 i - 1 - dp[i - 1]，该位置必须为 ( ———— dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + 2 + dp[i - dp[i - 1] - 2]「若存在，表示配对位置前一个位置存在有效括号对」
public int longestValidParentheses(String s) {
    // dp[i] 表示以i下标结尾的最长有效字符串的长度
    int n = s.length();
    int[] dp = new int[n + 1];
    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        char c = s.charAt(i);
        if (c == ')') {
            if (s.charAt(i - 1) =='(') {
                dp[i] = ((i - 2 >= 0) ? dp[i - 2] : 0) + 2;
            } else if (dp[i - 1] > 0 && i - 1 - dp[i - 1] >= 0 && s.charAt(i - 1 - dp[i - 1]) == '('){ 
                // i - 1位置必须是有效的括号对
                // 与 i 配对的位置是 i - 1 - dp[i - 1]，需要判断其之前是否有符合的序列
                int t = (i - dp[i - 1] - 2 >= 0) ? dp[i - dp[i - 1] - 2] : 0;
                dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + t + 2;
            }
        }
        res = Math.max(res, dp[i]);
    }
    return res;
}

59. 31. 下一个排列
#

  • 从后往前找第一个下降的位置记为i
  • 从后往前找第一个大于i位置的位置，记为k
  • 交换 i 和 k，将 i 之后的reverse「因为i之后的已经有序递减」
class Solution {
    public void nextPermutation(int[] nums) {
        int i = nums.length - 2;
        if (i < 0) {
            return;
        }
        int j = i + 1;
        // find nums[i] < nums[j]
        while (i >= 0 && nums[i] >= nums[j]){
            i--;
            j--;
        }

        if (i >= 0) {
            // find nums[i] < nums[k]
            int k = nums.length - 1;
            while(nums[i] >= nums[k]) {
                k--;
            }
            swap(i, k, nums);
            // reverse j ~ nums.length - 1
            int mid = (i + 1 + nums.length) / 2;
            for (int p = j; p < mid; p++) {
                swap(p, nums.length - p + j - 1, nums);
            }
        } else {
            // reverse
            int mid = nums.length / 2;
            for (int p = 0; p < mid; p++) {
                swap(p, nums.length - p - 1, nums);
            }          
        }
    }

    private void swap(int i, int j, int[] nums) {
        int t = nums[i];
        nums[i] = nums[j];
        nums[j] = t;
    }
}

60.538. 把二叉搜索树转换为累加树
#

按右子树、节点、左子树的顺序遍历一次，记录当前累加和

class Solution {
    private int sum = 0;
    public TreeNode convertBST(TreeNode root) {
        dfs(root);
        return root;
    }

    private void dfs(TreeNode root) {
        if (root == null) {
            return;
        }

        dfs(root.right);
        sum += root.val;
        root.val = sum;
        dfs(root.left);
    }
}

61.「Hard」23. 合并 K 个升序链表
#

使用小顶堆保存链表节点，每次弹出后，把弹出节点的 next 压入堆中

public ListNode mergeKLists(ListNode[] lists) {
    if (lists == null || lists.length == 0) return null;
    PriorityQueue<ListNode> queue = new PriorityQueue<>((o1, o2) -> o1.val - o2.val);
    ListNode dummy = new ListNode();
    ListNode p = dummy;
    for (ListNode node : lists) {
        if (node != null) queue.add(node);
    }

    while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
        p.next = queue.poll();
        p = p.next;
        if (p.next != null) {
            queue.add(p.next);
        }
    }
    return dummy.next;
}

62.560. 和为 K 的子数组
# 

public int subarraySum(int[] nums, int k) {
    int res = 0;
    int preSum = 0; // 前缀和
    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(nums.length + 1);
    map.put(0, 1); // 和为 0 的子数组出现 1 次，[]
    for (int num : nums) {
        preSum += num;
        // 前缀和 - k 的个数 = 到当前位置连续和为 k 的子数组的个数
        res += map.getOrDefault(preSum - k, 0);
        // 更新前缀和出现次数
        map.put(preSum, map.getOrDefault(preSum, 0) + 1);
    }

    return res;
}

63.「Easy」21. 合并两个有序链表
# 

public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode list1, ListNode list2) {
    ListNode dummy = new ListNode();
    ListNode p = dummy;
    while (list1 != null && list2 != null) {
        if (list1.val < list2.val) {
            p.next = list1;
            list1 = list1.next;
        } else {
            p.next = list2;
            list2 = list2.next;
        }
        p = p.next;
    }

    if (list1 != null) {
        p.next = list1;
    }

    if (list2 != null) {
        p.next = list2;
    }

    return dummy.next;
}

64.「Easy」20. 有效的括号
#

使用栈保存各类型的左括号

  • 遍历到左括号则入栈
  • 遍历到右括号，判断栈是否空，再出栈进行比对
  • 最后看栈是否为空
public boolean isValid(String s) {
    int n = s.length();
    char[] chs = new char[n];
    int top = -1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        char c = s.charAt(i);
        if (c == '(' || c == '[' || c == '{') {
            chs[++top] = c;
        } else {
            if (top == -1) {
                return false;
            }
            char t = chs[top--];
            if ((c == ')' && t != '(') || (c == ']' && t != '[') || (c == '}' && t != '{')) {
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
    return top == -1;
}

65.19. 删除链表的倒数第 N 个结点
#

使用dummy节点来方便删除第一个

public ListNode removeNthFromEnd(ListNode head, int n) {
    ListNode dummy = new ListNode(0, head);
    ListNode p = dummy, q = dummy;
    while (n-- > 0) {
        p = p.next;
    }
    while (p.next != null) {
        p = p.next;
        q = q.next;
    }
    q.next = q.next.next;
    return dummy.next;
}

66.17. 电话号码的字母组合
#

回溯

class Solution {
    private String[] map = {"abc", "def", "ghi", "jkl", "mno", "pqrs", "tuv", "wxyz"};
    private List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();
    public List<String> letterCombinations(String digits) {
        if (digits.length() != 0) {
            dfs(digits, 0, new StringBuilder());
        } 
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(String digits, int pos, StringBuilder path) {
        if (pos >= digits.length()) {
            res.add(path.toString());
            return;
        }
        String choice = map[digits.charAt(pos) - '2'];
        for (char c : choice.toCharArray()) {
            path.append(c);
            dfs(digits, pos + 1, path);
            path.deleteCharAt(path.length() - 1);
        }
    }
}

67.15. 三数之和
# 

public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {
    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();
    // 先排序
    Arrays.sort(nums);
    int n = nums.length;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 2; i++) {
        int x = nums[i];
        // 优化
        if (i > 0 && nums[i - 1] == x) continue;
        if (x + nums[i + 1] + nums[i + 2] > 0) break;
        if (x + nums[n - 2] + nums[n - 1] < 0) continue;

        int j = i + 1, k = n - 1;
        // 双指针
        while (j < k) {
            int sum = x + nums[j] + nums[k];
            if (sum > 0) k--;
            else if (sum < 0) j++;
            else {
                // 移动双指针到下一个不一样的值
                res.add(List.of(x, nums[j++], nums[k--]));
                while (j < k && nums[j] == nums[j - 1]) j++;
                while (k > j && nums[k] == nums[k + 1]) k--;
            }
        }
    }

    return res;
}

68.2. 两数相加
#

注意结束条件是进位为0，且两个链表都空即可

public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
    ListNode res = new ListNode();
    ListNode p = res;
    int prev = 0;
    while (true) {
        int cur = prev;
        if (l1 != null){ 
            cur += l1.val;
            l1 = l1.next;
        }
        if (l2 != null) {
            cur += l2.val;
            l2 = l2.next;
        }
        prev = cur / 10;
        cur %= 10;
        p.next = new ListNode(cur);
        p = p.next;
        if (prev == 0 && l1 == null && l2 == null) return res.next;
    }
}

69.11. 盛最多水的容器
#

双指针，每次移动当前短的板

  • 若移动长板，则水槽的短板可能不变或变小，面积一定变小
  • 若移动短板，则水槽的短板可能增大，面积可能增大
public int maxArea(int[] height) {
    int ans = 0;
    int left =0, right = height.length - 1;
    while (left < right) {
        ans = Math.max(ans, (right - left) * Math.min(height[left], height[right]));
        if (height[right] > height[left]) left++;
        else right--;
    }
    return ans;
}

70.5. 最长回文子串
#

先找核心点，如下共 2n - 1 个

  • b a b a d
  • left : 0 0 1 1 2 2 3 3 4 = i / 2
  • right: 0 1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 = (i + 1) / 2
public String longestPalindrome(String s) {
    int n = s.length();
    int max = 0, maxLeft = 0, maxRight = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 2 * n - 1; i++) {
        int left = i / 2;
        int right = (i + 1) / 2;

        int len = right - left + 1;
        while (left >= 0 && right < n && s.charAt(left) == s.charAt(right)) {
            len += 2;
            if (max < len) {
                max = len;
                maxLeft = left;
                maxRight = right;
            }
            left--;
            right++;
        }
    }

    return s.substring(maxLeft, maxRight + 1);
}

71.「Hard」4. 寻找两个正序数组的中位数
#

方法一、O(m+n)，再难的就算了吧

public double findMedianSortedArrays(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {
    int m = nums1.length, n = nums2.length;
    int len = m + n;
    int prev = -1, cur = -1;
    int aStart = 0, bStart = 0;
    // 奇数偶数都需要遍历 len / 2 次
    for (int i = 0; i <= len / 2; i++) {

        prev = cur;
        if (aStart < m && (bStart >= n || nums1[aStart] < nums2[bStart])) {
            // nums1 未达到最后，且nums2到了最后 或者 nums1的值比nums2值小
            cur = nums1[aStart++];
        } else {
            cur = nums2[bStart++];
        }
    }
    if ((len & 1) == 0) return (prev + cur) / 2.0;
    else  return cur;
}

72.3. 无重复字符的最长子串
#

使用一个列表存出现次数，当出现次数出现两次时，将之前的都去除

public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {
    int ans = 0;
    int left = 0, right = 0;
    int[] chsCount = new int[128];

    while (right < s.length()) {
        char c = s.charAt(right++);
        chsCount[c]++;
        while (chsCount[c] == 2) {
            chsCount[s.charAt(left++)]--;
        }
        ans = Math.max(ans, right - left);
    }
    return ans;
}

73.79. 单词搜索
#

使用visit来快速判断是否已经访问过

class Solution {
    boolean[][] visit;
    public boolean exist(char[][] board, String word) {
        visit = new boolean[board.length][board[0].length];
        for (int i = 0; i < board.length; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < board[0].length; j++) {
                if (dfs(board, word, i, j, 0)) return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    private boolean dfs(char[][] board, String word, int i, int j, int cur) {
        if (i < 0 || j < 0 || i >= board.length || j >= board[0].length || visit[i][j] || board[i][j] != word.charAt(cur)) {
            return false;
        }
        if (cur == word.length() - 1) return true;
        visit[i][j] = true;
        boolean all = dfs(board, word, i, j + 1, cur + 1) || dfs(board, word, i + 1, j, cur + 1) 
                   || dfs(board, word, i, j - 1, cur + 1) || dfs(board, word, i - 1, j, cur + 1);
        visit[i][j] = false;
        return all;
    }
}

74.114. 二叉树展开为链表
# 

public void flatten(TreeNode root) {
    while (root != null) {
        // 直接考虑下一个节点
        if (root.left == null) {
            root = root.right;
        } else {
            // 找左子树最右的节点
            TreeNode pre = root.left;
            while (pre.right != null) {
                pre = pre.right;
            }
            // 将原来的右子树接到左子树的最右节点
            pre.right = root.right;
            // 将左子树插入右子树
            root.right = root.left;
            root.left = null;
            // 考虑下一个节点
            root = root.right;
        }
    }
}

75.621. 任务调度器
#

直接抄的，可以看看思路

public int leastInterval(char[] tasks, int n) {
    int[] taskCount = new int[26];
    for (char c : tasks) {
        taskCount[c - 'A']++;
    }
    Arrays.sort(taskCount);
    // 计算最多的任务最少需要的时间
    int maxCount = taskCount[25];
    int res = (maxCount - 1) * (n + 1) + 1;
    int i = 24;
    // 若还有一样多的任务，则时间需要 + 1
    while (i >= 0 && taskCount[i] == maxCount) {
        i--;
        res++;
    }
    // 此时，中间会有一些空余位置可以插入其他少数量的任务，假设可以插入 a 个任务，剩余 b 个任务
    // 若 a >= b 则答案为 res，若 a < b，则可以先插满 a 个位置，其他任务可以随意摆放，时间就是任务的总数量
    // 如果空位都插满之后还有任务，那就随便在这些间隔里面插入就可以
    return Math.max(res, tasks.length);
}

76.「Easy」617. 合并二叉树
# 

public TreeNode mergeTrees(TreeNode root1, TreeNode root2) {
    if (root1 == null) return root2;
    if (root2 == null) return root1;
    TreeNode res = new TreeNode(root1.val + root2.val);
    res.left = mergeTrees(root1.left, root2.left);
    res.right = mergeTrees(root1.right, root2.right);
    return res;
}

77.「Easy」104. 二叉树的最大深度
#

也可以用层序遍历去做

public int maxDepth(TreeNode root) {
    if (root == null) return 0;
    int max = 0;
    if (root.left != null) {
        max = Math.max(max, maxDepth(root.left));
    }
    if (root.right != null) {
        max = Math.max(max, maxDepth(root.right));
    }

    return max + 1;
}

78.105. 从前序与中序遍历序列构造二叉树
#

方法一、分治，递归

class Solution {
    public TreeNode buildTree(int[] preorder, int[] inorder) {
        // 使用前序遍历的首个元素划分中序遍历，按中序遍历的尺寸划分前序遍历的剩余元素
        return dfs(preorder, inorder, 0, preorder.length - 1, 0, preorder.length - 1);
    }

    private TreeNode dfs(int[] preorder, int[] inorder, int preLeft, int preRight, int inLeft, int inRight) {
        int n = preorder.length;
        if (preLeft >= n || inLeft >= n || preRight < 0 || inRight < 0 || preLeft > preRight || inLeft > inRight) return null;
        int cur = preorder[preLeft];
        TreeNode res = new TreeNode(cur);
        int t = inLeft;
        while (inorder[t] != cur) {
            t++;
        }
        res.left = dfs(preorder, inorder, preLeft + 1, preLeft + t - inLeft, inLeft, t - 1);
        res.right = dfs(preorder, inorder, preLeft + t - inLeft + 1, preRight, t + 1, inRight);
        return res;
    }
}

方法二、使用map简化计算长度

class Solution {
    public TreeNode buildTree(int[] preorder, int[] inorder) {
        int n = preorder.length;
        // 存储中序对应的下标位置，快速计算长度
        Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(n);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            map.put(inorder[i], i);
        }
        return dfs(preorder, 0, n, inorder, 0, n, map);
    }

    private TreeNode dfs(int[] preorder, int preL, int preR, int[] inorder, int inL, int inR, Map<Integer, Integer> map) {
        if (preL == preR) return null;
        // 计算左子树序列长度
        int leftLen = map.get(preorder[preL]) - inL;
        TreeNode node = new TreeNode(preorder[preL]);
        node.left = dfs(preorder, preL + 1, preL + 1 + leftLen, inorder, inL, inL + leftLen, map);
        node.right = dfs(preorder, preL + 1 + leftLen, preR, inorder, inL + 1 + leftLen, inR , map);
        return node;
    }
}

79.102. 二叉树的层序遍历
#

注意是队列不是栈啊！！！老搞错

public List<List<Integer>> levelOrder(TreeNode root) {
    if (root == null) return new ArrayList();
    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();
    Queue<TreeNode> queue = new LinkedList<>();
    queue.offer(root);
    while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
        int layerLen = queue.size();
        List<Integer> layer = new ArrayList<>();
        while (layerLen-- >0) {
            TreeNode p = queue.poll();
            layer.add(p.val);
            if (p.left != null) {
                queue.offer(p.left);
            }
            if (p.right != null) {
                queue.offer(p.right);
            }
        }
        res.add(layer);
    }
    return res;
}

80.「Easy」101. 对称二叉树
#

方法一、递归

  • 根据左左和右右一致、左右和右左一致来判断
class Solution {
    public boolean isSymmetric(TreeNode root) {
        return root == null || dfs(root.left, root.right);
    }

    private boolean dfs(TreeNode left, TreeNode right) {
        if (left == null && right == null) return true;
        else if (left != null && right != null && left.val == right.val) {
            return dfs(left.left, right.right) && dfs(left.right, right.left);
        }
        return false;
    }
}

方法二、迭代

  • 入队顺序左左和右右一对，左右和右左一对
  • 若入队时就没有一对，则直接返回false
public boolean isSymmetric(TreeNode root) {
    if (root.left == null || root.right == null) {
        return root.left == root.right;
    }

    Queue<TreeNode> queue = new LinkedList<>();
    queue.add(root.left);
    queue.add(root.right);
    while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
        TreeNode l = queue.poll();
        TreeNode r = queue.poll();
        if (l == null && r == null) {
            continue;
        }
        if (l == null || r == null || l.val != r.val) {
            return false;
        }

        queue.add(l.left);
        queue.add(r.right);
        queue.add(l.right);
        queue.add(r.left);
    }
    return true;
}

81.98. 验证二叉搜索树
#

思路值得学习，代码复制的抄的

class Solution {
    public boolean isValidBST(TreeNode root) {
        return isValidBST(root, Long.MIN_VALUE, Long.MAX_VALUE);
    }
    public boolean isValidBST(TreeNode root, long left, long right) {
        if (root == null) {
            return true;
        }
        long x = root.val;
        return left < x && x < right && isValidBST(root.left, left, x)  // 左子树都小于 x
                                     && isValidBST(root.right, x, right);   // 右子树大于 x
    }
}

82.96. 不同的二叉搜索树
#

太难了，抄的

public int numTrees(int n) {
    // dp[i] 表示以节点数量i的二叉搜索树的数量
    int[] dp = new int[n + 1];
    dp[0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {
            dp[i] += dp[j - 1] * dp[i - j]; // sum(元素节点个数为j-1的数量 * 元素节点个数为i-j的数量)
        }
    }
    return dp[n];
}

83.「Easy」94. 二叉树的中序遍历
#

方法一、递归

class Solution {
    public List<Integer> inorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
        List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();
        dfs(res, root);
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(List<Integer> res, TreeNode root) {
        if (root == null) return;
        dfs(res, root.left);
        res.add(root.val);
        dfs(res, root.right);
    }
}

方法二、迭代

public List<Integer> inorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
    List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();
    if (root == null) return res;

    Stack<TreeNode> stack = new Stack<>();
    TreeNode p = root;
    while (p != null || !stack.isEmpty()) {
        while (p != null) {
            stack.push(p);
            p = p.left;
        }
        p = stack.pop();
        res.add(p.val);
        p = p.right;
    }

    return res;
}

84.84. 柱状图中最大的矩形
# 

public int largestRectangleArea(int[] heights) {
    int n = heights.length;
    int[] left = new int[n], right = new int[n];
    // 单调递增栈
    Deque<Integer> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        // 栈顶 >= 当前元素，说明不是左侧最小，出栈
        while (!stack.isEmpty() && heights[stack.peek()] >= heights[i]) {
            stack.pop();
        }
        left[i] = stack.isEmpty()? -1 : stack.peek();
        stack.push(i); 
    }

    stack.clear();
    for (int i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        while (!stack.isEmpty() && heights[stack.peek()] >= heights[i]) {
            stack.pop();
        }
        right[i] = stack.isEmpty()? n : stack.peek();
        stack.push(i); 
    }

    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        res = Math.max(res, heights[i] * (right[i] - left[i] - 1));
    }
    return res;
}

85.「Easy」1. 两数之和
# 

public int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) {
    Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();

    for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
        if (map.containsKey(target - nums[i])) {
            return new int[]{i, map.get(target - nums[i])};
        }
        map.put(nums[i], i);
    }

    return new int[]{-1, -1};
}

86.78. 子集
# 

class Solution {
    List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();

    public List<List<Integer>> subsets(int[] nums) {
        dfs(new ArrayList(), 0, nums);
        return res;
    }

    private void dfs(List<Integer> path, int i, int[] nums) {
        if (i == nums.length) {
            res.add(new ArrayList(path));
            return;
        }
        // 不选当前值
        dfs(path, i + 1, nums);q

        // 选
        path.add(nums[i]);
        dfs(path, i + 1, nums);
        path.remove(path.size() - 1);
    }
}

87.「Hard」76. 最小覆盖子串
#

方法一、模拟滑动窗口，磕磕盼盼a出来，超过10.63%

class Solution {
    public String minWindow(String s, String t) {
        Map<Character, Integer> mapt = getMap(t, 0, t.length() - 1);
        Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
        int i = 0;
        while (i < s.length()) {
            char c = s.charAt(i);
            map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);
            if (mapContains(map, mapt)) break;
            i++;
        }

        if (i == s.length()) return "";
        int right = i;
        int left = 0;
        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
        for (int j = 0; j < s.length() && i < s.length(); j++) {
            char c = s.charAt(j);
            map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) - 1);
            if (!mapContains(map, mapt)) {
                if (min > i - j) {
                    min = i - j;
                    left = j;
                    right = i;
                }
                i++;
                while (i < s.length()) {
                    c = s.charAt(i);
                    map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);
                    if (mapContains(map, mapt)) break;
                    i++;
                }
            }
        }


        return s.substring(left, right + 1);
    }

    private Map<Character, Integer> getMap(String s, int left, int right) {
        Map<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
        while (left <= right) {
            char c = s.charAt(left);
            map.put(c, map.getOrDefault(c, 0) + 1);
            left++;
        }
        return map;
    }

    private boolean mapContains(Map<Character, Integer> left, Map<Character, Integer> right) {
        for (char c : right.keySet()) {
            if (right.get(c) > left.getOrDefault(c, 0)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
}

88.75. 颜色分类
# 

class Solution {
    public void sortColors(int[] nums) {
        int left = -1, right = nums.length;
        int mid = 0;
        while (mid < right) {
            if (nums[mid] == 2) {
                swap(nums, mid, --right);   // 交换后需要考虑再次交换当前位置
            } else if (nums[mid] == 0) {
                swap(nums, mid++, ++left);  // 交换后无需再次交换
            } else {
                mid++;
            }
        }
    }

    private void swap(int[] nums, int i, int j) {
        int t = nums[i];
        nums[i] = nums[j];
        nums[j] = t;
    }
}

89.「Easy」70. 爬楼梯
# 

public int climbStairs(int n) {
    // dp[i] 表示i阶楼梯的不同方法
    // dp[i + 2] = dp[i + 1] + dp[i]; // 从i + 1 或 i 位置上来
    int[] dp = new int[n + 1];
    dp[0] = 1;
    dp[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + dp[i - 2];
    }

    return dp[n];
}

90.72. 编辑距离
#

高频，太难了，抄的，dp需要细看

public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {
    // dp[i][j] 表示 word1[0...i] 转换为 word2[0...j] 需要的最少操作数
    int m = word1.length(), n = word2.length();
    int[][] dp = new int[m + 1][n + 1];
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        dp[i][0] = i;
    }
    for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {
        dp[0][j] = j;
    }
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {
            if (word1.charAt(i - 1) == word2.charAt(j - 1)) {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1]; // 无需进行修改
            } else {
                dp[i][j] = Math.min(Math.min(dp[i - 1][j],           // 删除操作：删除word1[i]
                                    dp[i][j - 1]),                   // 插入操作：在word1前i之后插入字符word2[j]
                                    dp[i - 1][j - 1]) + 1;           // 替换操作：将word1[i] 替换为word2[j]
            }
        }
    }

    return dp[m][n];
}

91.581. 最短无序连续子数组
#

方法一、排序后对比

public int findUnsortedSubarray(int[] nums) {
    int[] arr = nums.clone();
    Arrays.sort(nums);
    int i = 0, j = nums.length - 1;
    while (i <= j && nums[i] == arr[i]) i++;
    while (i <= j && nums[j] == arr[j]) j--;
    return j - i + 1;
}

92.64. 最小路径和
#

方法一、直观一点

public int minPathSum(int[][] grid) {
    // dp[i][j] 表示到达 i j 时最小总和
    int m = grid.length, n = grid[0].length;
    int[][] dp = new int [m][n];
    dp[0][0] = grid[0][0];
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            if (i == 0 && j == 0) continue;
            else if (i == 0)  dp[i][j] = dp[i][j - 1] + grid[i][j];
            else if (j == 0)  dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] + grid[i][j];
            else dp[i][j] = Math.min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]) + grid[i][j];
        }
    }

    return dp[m - 1][n - 1];
}

方法二、上面的优化，预先初始化，减少了for内的判断

public int minPathSum(int[][] grid) {
    // dp[i][j] 表示到达 i j 时最小总和
    int m = grid.length, n = grid[0].length;
    int[][] dp = new int [m][n];
    dp[0][0] = grid[0][0];
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        dp[0][i] = dp[0][i - 1] + grid[0][i];
    }
    for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {
        dp[i][0] = dp[i - 1][0] + grid[i][0];
    }
    for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j < n; j++) {
            dp[i][j] = Math.min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]) + grid[i][j];
        }
    }

    return dp[m - 1][n - 1];
}

93.62. 不同路径
# 

public int uniquePaths(int m, int n) {
    // dp[i][j] 表示到达 i j 位置的不同路径数
    // dp[0][i] = 1  dp[j][0] = 1
    // dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] + dp[i][j - 1]
    int[][] dp = new int[m][n];

    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        dp[i][0] = 1;
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            dp[0][j] = 1;
            if (i != 0 && j != 0) {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] + dp[i][j - 1];
            }
        }
    }

    return dp[m - 1][n - 1];
}

上面代码可以优化为一唯数组

public int uniquePaths(int m, int n) {
    int[] dp = new int[n];
    Arrays.fill(dp, 1);

    for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j < n; j++) {
            dp[j] += + dp[j - 1];
        }
    }

    return dp[n - 1];
}

94.56. 合并区间
# 

public int[][] merge(int[][] intervals) {
    Arrays.sort(intervals, (a, b) -> a[0] - b[0]);

    int n = intervals.length;
    int i = 0;
    List<int[]> res = new ArrayList<>();
    while (i < n) {
        int left = intervals[i][0];
        int right = intervals[i][1];
        while (i + 1 < n && right >= intervals[i + 1][0]) {
            right = Math.max(right, intervals[++i][1]);
        }
        res.add(new int[]{left, right});
        i++;
    }            
    return res.toArray(new int[0][]);
}

95.55. 跳跃游戏
#

方法一、动态规划

public boolean canJump(int[] nums) {
    boolean[] dp = new boolean[nums.length];
    dp[nums.length - 1] = true;
    for (int i = nums.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        int step = nums[i];
        while (step > 0) {
            if (i + step < nums.length && dp[i + step] == true) {
                dp[i] = true;
                break;
            }
            step--;
        }
    }
    return dp[0];
}

方法二、从起点开始，更新最大位置，若遍历中超过最大位置则无法跳跃

public boolean canJump(int[] nums) {
    int max = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
        if (i > max) return false;
        max = Math.max(max, i + nums[i]);
    }
    
    return true;
}

96.53. 最大子数组和
#

方法一、动态规划

public int maxSubArray(int[] nums) {
    // dp[i] 表示以 nums[i] 结尾的最大和连续子数组
    // dp[0] = nums[0]
    // dp[i + 1] = max(dp[i] + nums[i + 1], nums[i + 1])
    int[] dp = new int[nums.length];
    dp[0] = nums[0];
    int max = nums[0];
    for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {
        dp[i] = Math.max(dp[i - 1] + nums[i], nums[i]);
        if (dp[i] > max) max = dp[i];
    }
    return max;
}

方法二、动态规划空间优化

public int maxSubArray(int[] nums) {
    int pre = 0, max = nums[0];
    for(int x: nums){
        pre = Math.max(pre + x, x);
        max = Math.max(pre, max);
    }
    return max;
}
